original_text: “And to the angel of the church in Smyrna write: ‘The words of the first and the last, who died and came to life.
korean_text: 서머나 교회의 사자에게 편지하라 처음이며 마지막이요 죽었다가 살아나신 이가 이르시되

sentences.original_text: And to the angel of the church in Smyrna write:
The words of the first and the last,
who died and came to life.
